B. Sodium chloride

A. Ethanol and dimethyl ether 
B. Benzene and methylbenzene 
C. Ethanol and propanone 
D. Trichloromethane and tetrachloromehane

saturated solution of NaHCO3 is . 
A. hydroxyl group 
B. carbonalkoxyl group 
C. carbonyl group 
D. carboxy group.

A. Substitution B. Elimination 
C. Addition D. Saponificatioon
